app.name: Doc.AI
app.description: Organize, analyze and get valuable insights from your personal documents with artificial intelligence

hero.title: Transform your documents into valuable insights
hero.subtitle: Organize, analyze and get important information from your personal documents with the help of artificial intelligence

features.title: Powerful features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your personal documents

secure.title: Security first
secure.description: Your documents are encrypted and protected with the most advanced security technologies

organize.title: Simplified organization
organize.description: Categorize and easily find your documents with our intuitive interface

ai.title: Intelligent analysis
ai.description: Our AI extracts important information and generates valuable insights from your documents

organize.title: Simplified organization
organize.description: Categorize and easily find your documents with our intuitive interface

access.title: Access anywhere
access.description: Access your documents from any device, anytime

privacy.title: Your privacy is our priority
privacy.description: Developed based on the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD), ensuring full control over your personal information
privacy.learn_more: Learn more about our privacy policy

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied users who trust Doc.AI

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Create your account now and start organizing your documents

about.title: About Doc.AI
about.subtitle: Our mission is to simplify document management with artificial intelligence
about.description: Doc.AI was created to help people organize and extract value from their personal documents. Using artificial intelligence, we transform simple documents into valuable insights.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We believe that everyone should have easy access to the information contained in their documents, in a secure and private way.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To simplify document management and help people make better decisions based on the information contained in their documents.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We respect your privacy and give you full control over your data.

security.title: Security
security.description: We use the most advanced security technologies to protect your documents.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We are always looking for new ways to improve our services and provide a better experience.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We are transparent about how we use your data and what we do with it.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a team of passionate professionals dedicated to creating the best document management experience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!
contact.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Start organizing your documents

register.terms: I agree to the terms of service and privacy policy

forgot.title: Forgot password
forgot.subtitle: Enter your email to reset your password

verify.title: Verify your email
verify.subtitle: Check your inbox for a verification link
verify.message: We've sent a verification link to your email. Please click on the link to verify your account.

upload_modal.title: Upload document
upload_modal.drag: Drag and drop your document here

delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action cannot be undone.

consents.title: Consent Management
consents.subtitle: Manage how your data is used
consents.description: Control how your data is processed and shared. You can change your preferences at any time.

data_processing.title: Data Processing
data_processing.description: Allows basic processing of your data to provide essential services. This consent is required for the system to function.

ai_processing.title: AI Processing
ai_processing.description: Allows your documents to be analyzed by AI algorithms to extract relevant information and generate insights.

marketing_emails.title: Marketing Emails
marketing_emails.description: Allows sending emails with news, tips, and special offers related to our services.

third_party_sharing.title: Third-Party Sharing
third_party_sharing.description: Allows sharing of aggregated and anonymous data with partners to improve our services.

history.title: Consent History
history.description: View the complete history of changes to your consents.

delete_confirm.title: Delete account
delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently removed.

ai_settings.subtitle: Manage artificial intelligence providers
